attributes.additional_details:
7months ago I got in touch with kingstanding local councillor about Mayfair passage to be cleaned up, and still nothing hasn't been done! The bushes are over grown rubbish everywhere the lights don't work properly.
It needs cleaning up it dangerous kids old people work down there!
Please help me get it sorted!
attributes.background: Help me get Mayfair passage cleaned up please

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of your local council.

You can petition your local council. You can find out more about how to do that here:

https://www.birmingham.gov.uk/info/20146/consultation_and_engagement/702/e-petitions
